Reviews.Title: Don't buy from this dealer! They are way Over priced!!
Reviews.Author: James P. Fuqua
Reviews.Content: $2999.99 ?!?!?!?!?! WTF hahahahahahaha you can buy from Lenovo directly for $1599.  They must be crazy to think that someone will buy from them for this much!!

Reviews.Title: firmware problems
Reviews.Author: Carlos Castellanos Leal
Reviews.Content: Couldnt turn it on because of a firmware problem. I'm shure it would have been a great device but now I'm in the return process.

ProductInfo.Features:
14-inch QHD LED glossy multi-touch with integrated camera
1.8 GHz 4th Generation Intel Core i7-4500U processor, 8 GB PC3-12800 DDR3L SDRAM
512 GB SSD, with Intel HD graphics 4400
Bluetooth 4.0 interface syncs with compatible devices Micro HDMI output expands your viewing options Built-in media reader for simple photo transfer
